body: Fuck the stupid ass parents dying comment. If you're reading this, you are immune from all of these shitty copy-pasted comments forever.I hereby bless your parents with 10 years of luck. There, copy-paste that.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry, dont forgive me
weird crossover but it worked out well
